MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele, affecting properties in Betws Yn Rhos and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of  a grounded overhead line conductor and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20AM on 18th February 2021
